argumentText:

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | cxpcn.d | |- D = ( CC \ ( -oo (,] 0 ) ) |

| 3 |  | cxpcn.k | |- K = ( J |`t D ) |

| 28 | 27 | #P_eqcomi | |- J = ( J |`t CC ) |

| 37 | 17, 13, 18, 34, 36 | #P_cnmpt22f | |- ( T. -> ( x e. D , y e. CC |-> ( y x. ( log ` x ) ) ) e. ( ( K tX J ) Cn J ) ) |
